foreignData.name: Prüfung des Heliod
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur
Immer wenn die verzauberte Kreatur angreift, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf sie. Falls dann drei oder mehr +1/+1-Marken auf ihr liegen, opfere die Prüfung des Heliod.
Wenn du die Prüfung des Heliod opferst, erhältst du 10 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.name: Ordalía de Heliod
foreignData.text:

Cuando sacrifiques la Ordalía de Heliod, ganas 10 vidas.

foreignData.name: Épreuve d'Héliode

Quand vous sacrifiez l'Épreuve d'Héliode, vous gagnez 10 points de vie.

foreignData.name: Ordalia di Eliod

Quando sacrifichi l'Ordalia di Eliod, guadagni 10 punti vita.

foreignData.name: ヘリオッドの試練
foreignData.text:

あなたがヘリオッドの試練を生け贄に捧げたとき、あなたは10点のライフを得る。

foreignData.name: Испытание Гелиода

name: Ordeal of Heliod
originalText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod, you gain 10 life.

rulings.text: The +1/+1 counter is put on the creature before blockers are declared and before combat damage is dealt.

The check of whether the enchanted creature has three or more +1/+1 counters on it happens as part of the resolution of the attack triggered ability. If the third +1/+1 counter is put on the enchanted creature any other way, you won’t sacrifice the Ordeal until the next time the creature attacks.
If you sacrifice the Ordeal in some other way, its last ability will trigger.
